Title: Relates to remedies for violations of the New York state uniform fire prevention and building code act which threaten imminent physical harm to occupants of a property
Summary: Relates to remedies for violations of the New York state uniform fire prevention and building code act which threaten imminent physical harm to occupants of a property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to remedies for violations of the New York state uniform fire prevention and building code act
